tool_description:
API that lets you generate a new League of Legends Champion
This API allows you to specify a Champion Name and then will attempt to generate abilities that will match with any theme related to the name.
If no name is specified, it will generate a champion name along with all abilities including the passive ability.
name: League Of Legends Champion Generator
title: League Of Legends Champion Generator

api_list.name: Generate League Of Legends Champion
api_list.description: Will generate a new champion along with its passive and standard abilities.
